name: At-Hack the planet
description:
Welcome to my little game

How to play : -left- and -right-
You need to hack as much "data center"
as you can before your enemy does within 60s...

===

Assets used :

Planet : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/stylized-earth-...

Bot : https://maxparata.itch.io/voxel-mechas

Music made on especially for this game by Amnexia : https://www.youtube.com/c/AmNeXiA

Everything else is self-made

===

Will definitly add some features :

- meteor falling could kill the player/bot for 5sec

- random spawn for the player/bot

- random spawn for the "data center"

- customize "data center" skin (couldn't find suitable one for each within that time)

- turn it mobile-friendly with tap control

- different level for the AI

(- and fix the last bug I found)

===

What did I learn during the Jam ? :

Gravity calculation, how to remove the one from Unity to create my own.

Trail renderer (even tho I removed it at the end)
